name: deep-snake
description: A snake game trained using simple deep learning implemented in client side javascript.

scripts.postinstall: rollup src/index.js --format umd --name deepsnake --output build/js/deepsnake.js; cp -r static/* build
scripts.build: rollup src/index.js --format umd --name deepsnake --output build/js/deepsnake.js; cp -r static/* build

author: George Mamaladze
